metadata.description: The Azure region for all resources
Use Key Vault references in Container App (false for first deployment, true after RBAC propagates)
Tags to apply to all resources
Subnet ID for Function Apps to access Key Vault

networkAcls.virtualNetworkRules: [union(if(not(equals(parameters('containerAppsSubnetId'), '')), createArray(createObject('id', parameters('containerAppsSubnetId'), 'action', 'Allow')), createArray()), if(not(equals(parameters('functionAppsSubnetId'), '')), createArray(createObject('id', parameters('functionAppsSubnetId'), 'action', 'Allow')), createArray()))]

metadata.description: Use Key Vault references for secrets (requires RBAC to be configured first)
Subnet ID for Container Apps VNet integration

configuration.secrets: [if(parameters('useKeyVaultReferences'), createArray(createObject('name', 'django-secret-key', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/django-secret-key', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system'), createObject('name', 'postgres-password', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/postgres-password', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system'), createObject('name', 'storage-account-key', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/storage-account-key', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system'), createObject('name', 'appinsights-connection-string', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/appinsights-connection-string', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system')), createArray(createObject('name', 'django-secret-key', 'value', parameters('djangoSecretKey')), createObject('name', 'postgres-password', 'value', parameters('postgresPassword')), createObject('name', 'storage-account-key', 'value', parameters('storageAccountKey')), createObject('name', 'appinsights-connection-string', 'value', parameters('appInsightsConnectionString'))))]
